name: Mahedi Hasan
review: Hi, I am a traveler and this app is helping me a lot for traveling. I can explore many new places with the help of this app. It's really a awesome app. I am very thankful to the person who worked hard behind this service. I hope the content of this app will be update continuously..

name: Biplob Sarkar
review: One of the best travel guide app in Bangladesh. Thank you tourtodaybd team for such a excellent tour and travel app. If you know bangla language then i highly recommended you this tourtodaybd app. Still now it‚Äôs i's ads free and its have more then 700 tourist place information.

name: Daniel Hasnat
review: I've been in Bangladesh for three days, am staying for three months, and don't speak or read Bangla yet however, ENTIRE APP IS IN BANGLA. If it was available in English it might help me to find places to visit, but this app doesn't help or encourage visitors in your country at all.

name: LetuPutu
review: Best and bestest app for tour guide in Bangladesh.. I just love it. I am using the app since February,2018.. This app is highly recommended for anyone who is looking for the best tour guide app

name: SHAMiM MUNNA
review: Just WoW! Too Much Helpful, I Love to Travel And I'm Damn Sure That This App Is Going to Help Me in Future.. Thanks To The Developers

name: Sajib Khan
review: Great app! A big thank you to the developers who worked hard on this. Keep up the good work to make the app even better with regular updates.

name: MD RUKONUZZAMAN
review: Very good app, but a little problem for internet connection! But again, the off-the-shelf aspect is good .. A good app for those who are thirsty for country travel. üëå‚ù§

name: Abid khan
review: 2021: Will there be any more updates on the app ???? 2018: Appata has been great, I like it very much. Bro, if possible 1. Add pictures to the list of hotels and resorts. 2. Bring full offline version. Thanks.
